useCase.name: Create New Pipeline and Dataset Instance
useCase.trigger: User selects option to create new pipeline

mainSequence.step: User selects option to create new pipeline
Web UI displays pipeline creation form
User fills in pipeline details and specifies new dataset instance
Pipeline initiates pipeline and dataset creation
Dataset Management Service verifies dataset type and version
Version Control provides dataset type specifications
Dataset Management Service confirms dataset type
Pipeline requests creation of new dataset instance
Dataset Instance Creator creates new dataset instance
Version Control registers new dataset instance version
Dataset Instance Creator confirms dataset instance creation
Pipeline confirms successful pipeline and dataset instance creation
Web UI displays success message and pipeline details
